GapFillDragDrop.Title: Dates and special occasions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose the correct answer and drag it to the space.

Content.Question:
Last Friday it was my grandmother's 80th birthday and we invited about twenty of her friends and relatives to our home for a surprise party. On Wednesday I went out with Elena, my two-year-old daughter, and bought a present for Granny: a lovely picture. On Wednesday Kevin had a day off work and went to pick her up. I cooked a special lunch for her and Elena and I made a big birthday cake with 80 on it. My brother couldn't come because he lives in Canada, but he sent her flowers and a card. Elena dressed up in her best clothes and at
2 o'clock Granny arrived. She was very surprised and pleased to see everyone and we all had a fantastic time It was Elena's first party and she stayed up very late. She didn't go to bed until 9 o'clock.
